isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Owner/Operator Spare Switch

svcproc.title: Owner/Operator Spare Switch
svcproc.para: Refer to the OWNER/OPERATOR SPARE SWITCH circuit diagrams in CTS-5119W or CTS-5273W. This option provides switched battery power on circuit 14AQ for owner/operator connections. Power from the (B2) battery stud is applied to the spare accessory relay (167) common terminal. With the key switch in the on or accessory position, the relay is energized applying the power to the spare accessory switch (517).
